name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Elk Grove East

reviews.text: Our trip was to visit family in Elk Grove. The room had 2 queen beds, a microwave and fridge.
reviews.title: A great deal in Elkgrove CA.
Ok
reviews.text: Breakfast was good and offered eggs biscuits and a pancake machine. The Hotel is placed next to many department stores, and medium priced restaurants, with a MC D across the street and groceries store about 5 min away. Easy access on 99 freeway south or north X 187.
DONOT Trust your GPS because Stockton has 2 zip codes. If you want to stay out of town traffic use I 5 from the Airport and get off on Laguna. Travel west about 4 miles.
reviews.title: Started off good, then went downhill

reviews.text: Clean enough, quiet enough, good enough. Decent breakfast. In a shopping area with stores, restaurants, and bars within walking distance.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel with best breakfast ever!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our stay at this Holiday Inn started off pretty good, but became rocky towards the end. After a quick and friendly check-in, we settled into our room. We wanted something quiet since we had a toddler with us so we requested the 3rd floor. It was fairly hot outside so we swam in the pool which was a tad on the cooler side for being heated.
reviews.title: Check room out carefully for foul odors

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was worth the extra money. Loved the pool. Loved the room. Place was a palace. Breakfast was awesome (grits!) and the internet room had plenty of computers and was comfortable. Nice and close to the automall. Tons of parking.
reviews.title: I felt like 50 cent himself

reviews.text: We stayed there for one night.
reviews.title: A good place

reviews.text: The hotel is right off the 99, but our room was quiet. The whole place is new and clean.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Bathroom, shower, bed sheets were all very clean.
reviews.title: Very nice!

reviews.text: The breakfast was basic but enough. The staff were friendly. It is in walking distance to an out door mall and several restaurants.
reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!

reviews.text: This hotel was fine - it is slightly below the average for what I have come to expect from a Holiday Inn Express, but it was fine. The location is convinient, the desk staff was very nice, and our room was clean. The beds weren't as comfortable and the linens not as nice as at other Holiday Inn Express hotels where I have stayed. The furnishings and decor also seemed to be on the cheap side. There wasn't anything wrong with the hotel and I would stay there again if staying in the area, but it wasn't quite up to par for the brand. .
reviews.title: Ok

reviews.text: I loved my stay at this hotel! When checking in, Maritza who was working that evening greeted me right away and made me feel very welcomed. My overall stay at this hotel was great. It was in a great location and liked the fact that it was close to my family's house. I will definitly be staying at this hotel in the future.
reviews.title: Friendly staff and very nice hotel

reviews.text: This hotel has a great location. It is close to the freeway, shopping and great restaurants. The rooms are large and clean. The pillows are full size which I really appreciate. Internet speeds are great! Breakfast bar is large, with a view of the pool. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable.
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable, Affordable

reviews.text: As a very frequent traveler, I see a lot of hotel rooms and this is one of the best!
reviews.title: Very convient and comfortable

reviews.text: Stayed here because it was near our friends house. It was in a very convenient location in a shopping center. You could walk to every restaurant or store you could think of. Loved the all the pillows on the beds (and the different ones - soft, firm). The continental breakfast was really good.
reviews.title: Terrific hotel choice in Elk Grove

reviews.text: Stayed for 4 nights. The hotel is clean, nice, great location, etc. But, for some reason, a few rooms were hosting graduation parties. At about 11:15pm on Sat., June 5th, an altercation on the first floor occurred and shots were fired. An 18 yr old boy that had recently graduated was hit in the chest. He managed to run up the stair well to the 3rd floor where he fell and was pronounced dead. Our room was just 20 yards or so from the incident and we weren't allowed in our rooms until 6:00am. So, no sleep!! There was little or no security in the area or hired by the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice Place Until the Murder Happened!
Ok place to sleep
reviews.text: http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/37539881/ns/local_news-sacramento_ca/#storyContinued
Not a lot of amenities but an ok place to rest up and return to the road.
reviews.title: Transitioned Well

reviews.text: This was a Comfort Inn & Suites when we visited last November. We arrived as the exterior and interior changes were underway. This is a great location, and a nice place to stay. We had a noisy neighbor our second night, and the desk took care of it within a few minutes. Very nice, comfortable rooms.
reviews.title: suprising experience

reviews.text: I was looking for a hotel for just an over night stop on the way to UC Davis from
reviews.title: Nice place

aka: Holiday Inn Express And Suites Elk Grove Hotel
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Elk Grove, CA. We're located right off HWY 99 and the Laguna Boulevard exit in the Laguna Gateway Shopping Center, approximately 20 miles from Sacramento International Airport, and a few minutes away from downtown.Our hotel features 116 graciously designed guest rooms and suites and free wireless high-speed Internet access throughout our hotel. In the morning enjoy our hot new Express Start breakfast bar featuring omelets, bacon and our mouthwatering signature cinnamon rolls everyday!We're proud to have the largest hotel banquet space in Elk Grove, boasting 3,400 square feet, for weddings, meetings or any other special event. Our facilities have the capacity to accommodate up to 400 people. Free and ample parking in front and back of our hotel.If you're traveling on your own, in a group or with family, you'll find this to be an awesome location for shopping, dining or just socializing! Century Movie Theater and United Artists Movie Theater are walking distance away, as well as Old Navy, Bed Bath & Beyond, Best Buy, TJ Maxx, Home Depot, Ulta Cosmetics and Salon & Strikes Bowling Alley.Restaurants galore! Mimi's Cafe, Macaroni Grill, Logan's Steakhouse, BJ's Brewhouse Bar & Grill, Mandangos Bar, Chili's, & Friday's. to name a few.Local businesses and attractions: All Data, Auto Zone, Apple Computers, Weyerhaeuser, Kaiser, Barbara Morse Wackford Aquatic & Community Complex.
